text:
True AI | London, UK | http://trueai.io | Full-time | Onsite Position: Junior Software Engineer

We need a Junior Software Engineer who is passionate about taking AI to the next level, and who is interested in building the company alongside the founders. As a Junior Software Engineer, you will be working closely with our researchers and playing a key role in the development of technical infrastructure at True AI from ground up, building highly scalable and real time system architecture that blends well with underlying deep learning algorithms.

More info: http://trueai.io/careers-juniorsoftware-engineer/

Apply by emailing kamil@trueai.io.
